item1.name: Spirit Visage
item1.description:
450 Health
40 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
100% Base Health Regen
  • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.

item2.name: Sterak's Gage
item2.description:
50 Attack Damage
400 Health
  • Bloodlust: Dealing damage to or taking damage from a champion grants a stack, restoring (2% max Health | 1.2% max Health for Ranged champions) over 6 seconds. Stacks beyond the first heal for 50% less.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 100 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).

    Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

item3.name: Cull
item3.description:
7 Attack Damage
  • Attacks restore 3 Health per hit.
  • Reap: Killing a lane minion grants 1 additional gold. Killing 100 lane minions grants an additional 350 bonus gold immediately and disables Reap.

item4.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item4.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Trinity Force
item5.description:
25 Attack Damage
35% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 25 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 30% AD).
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 10 Attack Speed.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item0.name: Frozen Heart
item0.description:
70 Armor
400 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Winter's Caress: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the Attack's damage.

item1.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item1.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item2.name: Divine Sunderer
item2.description:
40 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 10% target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration and 5% Magic Penetration.

    Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

item3.name: Null-Magic Mantle
item3.description: 25 Magic Resist

item4.name: Bramble Vest
item4.description:
35 Armor
  • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (3 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item5.name: Kindlegem
item5.description:
200 Health
10 Ability Haste

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item0.name: Doran's Shield
item0.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

item1.name: Sheen
item1.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (100% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

item2.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item2.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item3.name: Long Sword
item3.description: 10 Attack Damage

item4.name: Dagger
item4.description: 12% Attack Speed

item5.name: Ruby Crystal
item5.description: 150 Health

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

item2.name: Mercury's Treads
item2.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item0.name: Control Ward
item0.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 10% target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration and 5% Magic Penetration.

    Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

item1.name: Frozen Heart
item1.description:
70 Armor
400 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Winter's Caress: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the Attack's damage.

item2.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item2.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item3.name: Negatron Cloak
item3.description: 50 Magic Resist

item4.name: Winged Moonplate
item4.description:
150 Health
  • Flight: Grants 5% Move Speed.

item5.name: Doran's Shield
item5.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item0.name: Divine Sunderer
item0.description:
40 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 10% target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration and 5% Magic Penetration.

    Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

item1.name: Force of Nature
item1.description:
350 Health
60 Magic Resist
5% Move Speed
  • Absorb: Taking damage from Abilities grants you 8 Move Speed and 4 Magic Resist for 5 seconds (stacks up to 5 times; each unique Ability instance can give one stack).

item2.name: Bramble Vest
item2.description:
35 Armor
  • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (3 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item3.name: Frozen Heart
item3.description:
70 Armor
400 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Winter's Caress: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the Attack's damage.

item4.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item4.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Chain Vest
item5.description: 40 Armor

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.
